Title: Mens Accurist two tone rose and silver bracelet watch 7075
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Mens Accurist two tone rose and silver bracelet watch 7075 RRP £95.00 Now £65.00 Description The sleek large round dial to this mens Accurist watch measures 44mm in diameter including the crown. The large silver coloured face has rose tone angular batons marking each hour and a small date window at the six o’clock position. It has a slim style casing and minimal markings adding to the modern design. With a two tone rose and silver coloured design, this mens watch is on trend. The stainless steel bracelet has alternate rows of brushed silver and polished rose tone links creating a brick link finish. It is secured with a push button folding clasp. The bracelet can be professionally altered to the required wrist size with links available to be removed. At 30M water resistant this mens Accurist dress watch is splash resistant but care should be taken through wear around water. This mens quartz watch comes presented in Accurist branded packaging and with a 2 year manufacturer’s warranty. Chapelle reference: 08120467 Other Brands we stock About Chapelle Chapelle Jewellery is a family run business offering jewellery and watches with discounts of up to 50% off RRP. We purchase at the best possible prices and pass on these savings to our customers. All our items are new and perfect goods; we do not sell seconds or second-hand items. We are authorised stockists of all the brands we sell so you can be confident you're buying from a reputable company. Delivery Orders dispatched within the UK will be sent using Royal Mail Recorded Signed For first class. Orders being sent to international destinations will be sent by Royal Mail International Signed For delivery. Visit our ebay store for our full range >>
